name: Hermes (czarivar)
description:
Hermes may seem like a normal stray, but he has the uncanny ability to see into people's emotional space time. He uses his abilities to help the local residents, even though they all think he's a thieving nuisance.

Stand in front of sparkling objects and left-click to pick them up, left-click again to drop them.

Right-click with the reticle over an NPC to see through space time to find out what their problems are.
